ValidationRule.description: Ensures that key information required at conversion is specified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && IsConverted && NOT(LegacyLead__c) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource, "Purchased List" )) && FirstName != "Forgotten" && LastName != "Customer" && RecordType.DeveloperName = "General" && (ISBLANK(Email) || What_are_they_looking_for__c = "" || Family__c = "" || Income_Wealth__c = "" || ISPICKVAL(Current_adviser_in_place__c, "") || ISPICKVAL(Vulnerable_Client__c, ""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must complete the "Discovery Call Notes" section and vulnerability fields before you can convert this lead.
